keyword: calories in 1 cup of ground beef
title: Calories in 1 Cup of Ground Beef
meta_description: Learn calories in 1 cup of ground beef, plus detailed nutrition facts like protein, fat, carbs, and variations for different leanness levels.
h1: Calories in 1 Cup of Ground Beef
assumptions: Cooked (pan-broiled), 80% lean/20% fat, drained of excess fat; 1 cup â‰ˆ 200 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by leanness, cooking method, draining, and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1 cup of cooked 80% lean ground beef provides ~508 kcal and ~51 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup of cooked ground beef?
faqs.a: About 508 kcal for 80% lean, cooked and drained.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 1 cup ground beef?
Does leanness affect calories in ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes, 90% lean has ~200 kcal per 100 g vs. 254 for 80% lean.

faqs.q: Are carbs present in ground beef?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugars in plain ground beef.

faqs.q: How much fat in 1 cup of ground beef?
faqs.a: About 34 g total fat, including 13 g saturated.
